alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 5:56PM CDT until April 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR TENSAS...SOUTHWESTERN MADISON...NORTHERN CONCORDIA...NORTHERN CATAHOULA...FRANKLIN PARISHES IN NORTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 556 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bakers to near Jena, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Bakers and Crowville around 600 PM CDT. Wildsville around 615 PM CDT. Somerset and Afton around 620 PM CDT. Frogmore around 625 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Harrisonburg, Gilbert, Baskin, Sicily Island and Ridgecrest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
